response.original_title: Nontraditional Student: The New College Generation
response.overview: Nontraditional Student: The New College Generation is a compelling documentary that explores the unique experiences of nontraditional students navigating the modern college landscape. After retiring from the military, director Jenifer Trimble returned to school and set out to discover whether other nontraditional students shared her journey. This documentary sheds light on what it means to be a nontraditional student, balancing life, work, and the responsibility of returning to education later in life.
response.title: Nontraditional Student: The New College Generation
